tool_description: Manages domain transfers between registrars including authorization, status tracking, and post-transfer configuration.

auth_code.description: Domain authorization code from current registrar

error_messages: Invalid authorization code: Auth code is incorrect or has expired.
Domain locked: Domain is locked at current registrar and cannot be transferred.
Transfer prohibited: Domain is within 60 days of registration or previous transfer.
Registrar rejection: New registrar rejected the transfer request.
Contact verification failed: Unable to verify domain ownership for transfer.
usage: Provide domain name, target registrar, and authorization code. Configure contact transfer and post-transfer lock settings. Monitor transfer progress through status updates.

transfer_status.description: Current transfer status (initiated, pending, completed, failed)

estimated_completion.description: Estimated completion date in ISO format
